name: Moon Miner (Funky_Mushroom)
description:
This is a relaxing game made for the Kindred Community Game Jam #7.

Controls:

WASD- Move around

Space or W- Jump

Left Click- Use Pickaxe

Right Click an item on your Hotbar to equip it, and right click again in the world to use it.

1 and 2- Change volume

3 and 4- Change GUI scale

To smelt ore, you will need to put the ore you want to smelt in the furnace, along with some coal.

Backstory: You and your people have lived on the Sun for a long time, but recently resources have begin to run out as the sun's power dwindles. Your people have sent you to the moon to harvest Sun Stones and restore the Sun's power.

I hope you enjoy the game! If you have any problems, leave a comment and I'll see what I can do.

Version 1.1 adds a message to the furnace UI to make it more intuitive.
